Token.Abstract: A UALocationEvent captures all the necessary information for UAAnalytics

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: A dictionary populated with all required data

ReturnValue.Abstract: A UALocationEvent populated with appropriate values

Token.Abstract: Creates a UALocationEvent parsing the necessary data from the method parameters

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: Location going to UAAnalytics

Parameter.Name: provider
Parameter.Abstract: Provider that produced the location

Parameter.Name: updateType
Parameter.Abstract: One of the UALocationEvent updated types, see header for more details

ReturnValue.Abstract: UALocationEvent populated with the necessary values

Token.Abstract: Creates a UALocationEvent parsing the necessary data form the method parameters.

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: Location going to UAAnalytics

Parameter.Name: locationManager
Parameter.Abstract: The location manager that produced the location

Parameter.Name: updateType
Parameter.Abstract: One of the UALocationEvent updated types, see header for more details

ReturnValue.Abstract: UALocationEvent populated with the necessary values

Token.Abstract: Creates a UALocationEvent parsing the necessary data from the method parameters

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: Location going to UAAnalytics

Parameter.Name: provider
Parameter.Abstract: Provider that produced the location

Parameter.Name: updateType
Parameter.Abstract: One of the UALocationEvent updated types, see header for more details

ReturnValue.Abstract: UALocationEvent populated with the necessary values

Token.Abstract: Creates a UALocationEvent parsing the necessary data form the method parameters.

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: Location going to UAAnalytics

Parameter.Name: locationManager
Parameter.Abstract: The location manager that produced the location

Parameter.Name: updateType
Parameter.Abstract: One of the UALocationEvent updated types, see header for more details

Token.Abstract: Creates a dictionary with the appropriate data gathered from the CLLocation

Parameter.Name: dictionary
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary to populate with values

Parameter.Name: location
Parameter.Abstract: Location to parse values from

Token.Abstract: Creates a dictionary with the appropriate data gathered from the CLLocationManager

Parameter.Name: dictionary
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary to populate with values

Parameter.Name: locationManager
Parameter.Abstract: The location manager to parse values from

Token.Abstract: Creates a dictionary with the appropriate data gathered from the object conforming to the UALocationProviderProtocol

Parameter.Name: dictionary
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary to populate with values from the location provider

Parameter.Name: locationProvider
Parameter.Abstract: The object implementing the UALocationProviderProtocol to parse data from

Token.Abstract: Populates a dictionary with the defaulf values for reporting a significant change event. The values currently default to NONE, and are defined in the implementation file

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: The dictionary to populate with values

Token.Abstract: Converts a double to a string keeping seven digit of precision Seven digits produces sub meter accuracy at the equator. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decimal_degrees

Parameter.Name: doubleValue
Parameter.Abstract: The double to convert.

Token.Abstract: Converts a double to a string and truncating it to an int.

Parameter.Name: doubleValue
Parameter.Abstract: The double to convert and truncate

ReturnValue.Abstract: NSString representing the double as an int
